notifications.content: Flight JL827 to Dalian has been delayed due to bad weather conditions.Please contact the check-in-desk for further infomation.
Attention passengers on Flight JL827 to Dalian.The departure gate has been changed.The flight will now be leaving from gate 26.
Good afternoon passengers. This is the pre-boarding announcement for flight JL828 to Tokyo.
Weather warning. Tropical Storm Warning is in effect for Dalian during the next 24 hours.
